attributes.action: Set tariffs on the Chinese Government over the treatment of Uyghur Muslims
attributes.additional_details: The nation is undergoing the forced removal of children from their families to purpose built boarding schools, to essentially cleanse these children off their lineage. Prosecuted individuals are having their organs harvested as part of this process of mass genocide and ethnic cleansing. Forced marriages between religions by the state have been documented. Forced consumption of alcohol and pork. Countless more human right breaches can be listed, including torture.
attributes.background:
Reports have suggested that the chinese government has been placing Uyghur Muslims in “re-education” camps. Although dubbing them re-education camps would be an understating
This petition aims to direct the UK government to put pressure on the Chinese government for their breach of human rights.
